Name: Anthophobia
About the game: Anthophobia is side-scrolling action survival horror game where the world is falling apart by unknown infection. Travel through the post-apocalyptic environment and fight against horde of green zombies. Feature Side-scrolling action survival horror experience Unique horrifying monsters and bosses Oddly adorable support NPCs Over 75 pixel animation sex scenes 29 illustration by artists Fenrir/Sourjelly/Tsuyuta Kome/Jotti + 12 original illustration from V1.00(can be found in installed folder) 6 ~ 8 hours of gameplay
Meta Title: Anthophobia: Feb 28, 2020, Terrarium and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Anthophobia? Check out the release date (Feb 28, 2020), developer insights from Terrarium, and a complete game summary.
